resources.string: Don\'t have an account? Sign up
Please enter a valid first name!
Please enter a valid last name!
Please enter a valid email address!
Invalid password! Passwords must be at least 6 characters long and must not contain blank spaces!
Please check all the fields and try again!
Your account has been successfully created! You will be automatically logged in now.
There was a problem creating your account. Please try again!
An unknown error has occurred. Please contact the developer for support!
Please wait while we log you in…
There was a problem logging you in. Please check your username and password and try again!
There was an error with Google Play Services! Please try again!
Please enter the Email ID associated with your account below
Please wait while we send you an email with the password reset link…
The password reset link has been sent successfully! Please check your email for further instructions!
There was an error sending the password reset email. Please try again!
"There was an unknown error while updating your profile. Please try again!"
There was an error submitting your bunksheet request. Please try again!
Validation error! Please fill out all fields correctly and try again!
You must fill your profile completely before you can request bunksheets!
You must fill your profile completely before you can approve bunksheets!
You must fill your profile completely before you can view approved bunksheets!
Validation error! Please fill out all fields correctly and try again!
Please enter a valid phone number!
Please enter a valid roll number!
You cannot set a date of the future!
Please wait while we are submitting your bunksheet request…

Your device is offline. You may not be able to see the latest bunksheets till your device regains internet connectivity. However, any bunksheet you approve will be saved locally and will be synced once your device regains internet connectivity.

Your device is offline. Your latest approved bunksheets saved locally are displayed here. However, these approved bunksheets may not have been synced online and will be synced once your device regains internet connectivity.
Your device is offline. However, your profile updates will be saved locally and will be synced once your device regains internet connectivity.

Your device is offline. You can still view and delete all your bunksheets here. However, the latest approval and deletion status might not have been synced and will be synced once your device regains internet connectivity.
Your device is offline. However, your bunksheet will be saved locally and will be synced once your device regains internet connectivity.
On a scale of 1 to 5, how would you rate the user experience and ease of use of this app?
On a scale of 1 to 5, how would you rate the features and functionality of this app?
Any other comments? How can we make this app better? Your feedback is totally anonymous :)

Your feedback has been submitted successfully! Thank you for your valuable feedback! Please also consider rating us on Google Play by clicking on the \'Rate Us\' item in the navigation drawer! Thank you! :D
Please wait while we submit your feedback…
Your device offline. However, your feedback will be saved locally and will be synced once your device regains internet connectivity. Thank you for your valuable feedback!
Failed to send feedback! Please try again! :(
Are you sure you want to delete this bunksheet? This action cannot be undone!
